title: A Visit to the Zoo
description: Come along with Danni and Fran as they go on A Visit to the Zoo. Going to the zoo isn't what it used to be. There are many innovative things to see and do at the zoo. There is even a school at this zoo! Can you guess which animals each girl chooses as her favorite? Read the book and find out.
meta: African, baboon, ferrets, flamingo, Indian, lioness
Sequence Events : Sequence events from story
Initial Consonants : Identify and manipulate initial consonants
Vowel Digraphs : Sort words with the vowel digraph ea
Quotation Marks : Use quotation marks correctly to indicate dialogue
Content Vocabulary : Identify and make sense of difficult words in text

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
